short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select contacts from your clients LinkedIn connections and send them to your client as requests for introduction via Revu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you ready to start working more actively with referrals and introductions?

We all know that the best deals come through our satisfied customers, yet we do not utilize referrals in a more efficient way in our outreach.

With Revu's Chrome extension, you can quickly and efficiently start asking your network for specific introductions to their LinkedIn contacts.

With the help of Revu:
* You can quickly see which contacts are interesting for you and add them to a request.
* Use our seamless LinkedIn feature to send requests to be introduced to key individuals.
* Make the request feel personal with the help of video and text.
* Keep track of all your requests.

It's free to start testing!
For more info:
Email: support@revu.se
Website: www.revu.se
